Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Fists of Ironwood
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Fists of Ironwood enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
Enchanted creature has trample.
flavor_text: Saprolings add the three and the four to the "one-two punch."

name: Farseek
oracle_text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

name: Elvish Skysweeper
oracle_text: {4}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text: The spires of Ravnica are no different from the tall trees of other planes. The elves navigate and protect them just the same.

name: Elves of Deep Shadow
oracle_text: {T}: Add {B}. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.
flavor_text: Cast out of the Conclave generations ago, these elves found a home in the corrupted districts of the Golgari.

name: Dryad's Caress
oracle_text: You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. If {W} was spent to cast this spell, untap all creatures you control.
flavor_text: "I awoke to the face of beauty, my body fully healed. In that moment I knew my destiny was the Conclave's to shape." —Rogad, Selesnya initiate

name: Dowsing Shaman
oracle_text: {2}{G}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: He combs the streets looking for the lost light, the discarded enigmas of the city.

name: Doubling Season
oracle_text:
If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

name: Civic Wayfinder
oracle_text: When Civic Wayfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "These alleys are not safe. Come, I can guide you back to the market square."

name: Chord of Calling
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Carven Caryatid
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Carven Caryatid enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: So-called "old wood" is rare in deforested Ravnica. Statues carved from it are said to house the last of the ancient nature spirits.

name: Bramble Elemental
oracle_text: Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Bramble Elemental, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
flavor_text: Ravnica is a seamless urban tapestry, each city bleeding into the next. In abandoned corners, however, nature has begun to reclaim what it once owned.

name: Birds of Paradise
oracle_text:
Flying
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Long ago, birds of paradise littered the skies. Thanks to the city's sprawl, most now exist as pets of society's elite.

name: Wojek Embermage
oracle_text: Radiance — {T}: Wojek Embermage deals 1 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.
flavor_text: "Your brother's crimes are your crimes. You stood by and lent support, so you too must face judgment."

name: War-Torch Goblin
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice War-Torch Goblin: It deals 2 damage to target blocking creature.
flavor_text: "In a town shaped by the subtle machinations and political intrigue of its guilds, it's reassuring to see a goblin waving his torch and screaming about some nonsense or other." —Agrus Kos

name: Warp World
oracle_text: Each player shuffles all permanents they own into their library, then reveals that many cards from the top of their library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of their library.

name: Viashino Slasher
oracle_text: {R}: Viashino Slasher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Citizens of Ravnica stick to the main streets. Shortcuts may look tempting, but down each alley, dozens of hungry hands await, and screams do not carry into the busy market throng.

name: Viashino Fangtail
oracle_text: {T}: Viashino Fangtail deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: "When the bony terminus gets too large, it's shed from the tail in coinciding periods of heightened aggression and hunger." —Simic research notes

name: Torpid Moloch
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Sacrifice three lands: Torpid Moloch loses defender until end of turn.
flavor_text: Market hucksters sell molochs for use as watchdogs. Of course, that's all molochs do. Sit around . . . and watch.

name: Surge of Zeal
oracle_text: Radiance — Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: "If only my poxes were as infectious as their zealotry." —Savra

name: Stoneshaker Shaman
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's end step, that player sacrifices an untapped land.
flavor_text: There is no place in Ravnica for stagnation, no room for lands unfilled and untilled.

name: Sparkmage Apprentice
oracle_text: When Sparkmage Apprentice enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Pajik was amazed and pleased at his newfound powers. His pet cat Rivin was slightly less enthusiastic.

name: Smash
oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Ravnica's laws protect not its citizens but its industry. Aging equipment is destroyed rather than restored, to bring more money into the factories' coffers.

name: Sell-Sword Brute
oracle_text: When Sell-Sword Brute dies, it deals 2 damage to you.
flavor_text: "Killing is easy. Just wrap your hand around the haft, and wrap your enemy around the blade."

name: Seismic Spike
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Add {R}{R}.
flavor_text: Natural disasters in Ravnica are largely nullified by the Izzet. Unnatural disasters, on the other hand, happen all of the time.

name: Sabertooth Alley Cat
oracle_text:
Sabertooth Alley Cat attacks each combat if able.
{1}{R}: Creatures without defender can't block Sabertooth Alley Cat this turn.
flavor_text: It has eight lives' worth of hunger to satisfy.

name: Reroute
oracle_text:
Change the target of target activated ability with a single target. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Three hundred years of practice thwarted by an instant of mischief.

name: Rain of Embers
oracle_text: Rain of Embers deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text: There's plenty to talk about in the marketplaces of Ravnica, be it the latest feud between guilds or the terrible weather.

name: Ordruun Commando
oracle_text: {W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Ordruun Commando this turn.
flavor_text: Thick of muscle, stout of heart, and possessing a burning love of justice and the battlefield, the Ordruun minotaurs are the foundation of the Boros Legion.

name: Molten Sentry
oracle_text: As Molten Sentry enters the battlefield, flip a coin. If the coin comes up heads, Molten Sentry enters the battlefield as a 5/2 creature with haste. If it comes up tails, Molten Sentry enters the battlefield as a 2/5 creature with defender.
flavor_text: Some take after their father, Stone, some after their mother, Fire.

name: Mindmoil
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell, put the cards in your hand on the bottom of your library in any order, then draw that many cards.
flavor_text: "My criticism of the Izzet is that their impulse for learning seems too much like impulse and too little like learning." —Trigori, Azorius senator

name: Instill Furor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this creature unless it attacked this turn."
flavor_text: "The Rakdos know little of technology, but they definitely know how to push buttons." —Trivaz, Izzet mage

name: Indentured Oaf
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that Indentured Oaf would deal to red creatures.
flavor_text: All it knows is the difference between friend and food.

name: Incite Hysteria
oracle_text: Radiance — Until end of turn, target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain "This creature can't block."
flavor_text: "The Boros say they want to bring order to Ravnica. Funny then, how well they use chaos." —Trigori, Azorius senator

name: Hunted Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying, haste
When Hunted Dragon enters the battlefield, target opponent creates three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with first strike.
flavor_text: The knights see a mighty quarry. The dragon sees breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

name: Hammerfist Giant
oracle_text: {T}: Hammerfist Giant deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player.
flavor_text: "Oh sure, they buy a lot of ale, but I always find myself needing to rebuild after the giants have paid a visit." —Belko, owner of Titan's Keg tavern

name: Greater Forgeling
oracle_text: {1}{R}: Greater Forgeling gets +3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Few have seen the inner workings of Ravnica's furnaces, but neighboring districts catch brief glimpses in the horrors that escape the flames.

name: Goblin Spelunkers
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: Chimney sweeps, explorers of abandoned buildings, spire climbers . . . goblin spelunkers have found countless niches within Ravnica's metropolis.

name: Goblin Fire Fiend
oracle_text:
Haste
Goblin Fire Fiend must be blocked if able.
{R}: Goblin Fire Fiend gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Galvanic Arc
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Galvanic Arc enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target.
Enchanted creature has first strike.

name: Frenzied Goblin
oracle_text: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

name: Flash Conscription
oracle_text: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. If {W} was spent to cast this spell, the creature gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, you gain that much life" until end of turn.

name: Flame Fusillade
oracle_text: Until end of turn, permanents you control gain "{T}: This permanent deals 1 damage to any target."
flavor_text: "A single item acting as lantern and lance? Now that's military efficiency." —Brev Grezar, Boros lieutenant

name: Fiery Conclusion
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Fiery Conclusion deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: The Boros legionnaire saw a noble sacrifice, the Rakdos thug a blazing suicide, and the Izzet alchemist an experiment gone awry.

name: Excruciator
oracle_text: Damage that would be dealt by Excruciator can't be prevented.
flavor_text: "Though used as a piercing weapon, the tusk is more akin to a stinger, spreading pain instantly throughout the body of its victim. This specimen deserves further study." —Simic research notes

name: Dogpile
oracle_text: Dogpile deals damage to any target equal to the number of attacking creatures you control.
flavor_text: There is no shelter from this storm, its rain of fists, or the thunderous cackles of bloodlust.

name: Coalhauler Swine
oracle_text: Whenever Coalhauler Swine is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to each player.
flavor_text: Nothing stops industry in Ravnica—certainly not the safety of its workers.

name: Cleansing Beam
oracle_text: Radiance — Cleansing Beam deals 2 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.
flavor_text: "Justice is toothless without punishment. Righteousness cannot succeed without the suffering of the guilty." —Razia

name: Char
oracle_text: Char deals 4 damage to any target and 2 damage to you.
flavor_text: Izzet mages often acquire their magic reagents from dubious sources, so the potency of their spells is never predictable.

name: Breath of Fury
oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
When enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it and attach Breath of Fury to a creature you control. If you do, untap all creatures you control and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

name: Blockbuster
oracle_text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice Blockbuster: It deals 3 damage to each tapped creature and each player.
flavor_text: Vendors hung cords heavy with roots and laid out boxes of salted meat, unaware of the fiery disaster swiftly approaching.

name: Barbarian Riftcutter
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Barbarian Riftcutter: Destroy target land.
flavor_text: "Riftcutters are suicidal anarchists, waving those lightning axes around so much that the walls are as likely to fall as their foes." —Heruj, Selesnya initiate

name: Woebringer Demon
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature. If the player can't, sacrifice Woebringer Demon.
flavor_text: Each soul he devours adds its hunger to his own.

name: Vindictive Mob
oracle_text:
When Vindictive Mob enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.
Vindictive Mob can't be blocked by Saprolings.
flavor_text: Many minds, a single madness.

name: Vigor Mortis
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If {G} was spent to cast this spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: After fear and weakness rot away, that which remains is stronger than its living form.

name: Undercity Shade
oracle_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
{B}: Undercity Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Officially, there's nothing under that bridge to hunt . . . Unofficially, my torchers are too terrified to go there after nightfall." —Agrus Kos

name: Thoughtpicker Witch
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Look at the top two cards of target opponent's library, then exile one of them.
flavor_text: "Once the brew gets the brains nice and pickled, they're a lot easier to pick through."

name: Strands of Undeath
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Strands of Undeath enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards.
{B}: Regenerate enchanted creature.
flavor_text: "Why limit yourself to mortal law when you can outlive those who enforce it?" —Czaric, Orzhov prelate

name: Stinkweed Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.
Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly five cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Sins of the Past
oracle_text: Until end of turn, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead. Exile Sins of the Past.

name: Shred Memory
oracle_text:
Exile up to four target cards from a single graveyard.
Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Sewerdreg
oracle_text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Sacrifice Sewerdreg: Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text: They hardly have form, dripping through pipe and grate with the slip and stench of flowing sewage.

name: Sadistic Augermage
oracle_text: When Sadistic Augermage dies, each player puts a card from their hand on top of their library.
flavor_text: "Don't worry. I know the drill."

name: Roofstalker Wight
oracle_text: {1}{U}: Roofstalker Wight gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: No heartbeat to hear, no greed to bribe, no fear of death.

name: Ribbons of Night
oracle_text: Ribbons of Night deals 4 damage to target creature and you gain 4 life. If {U} was spent to cast this spell, draw a card.
flavor_text: "My favorite meal is angel's flesh, slain in agony and iced with black vinegar." —Aszala of House Dimir

name: Nightmare Void
oracle_text:
Target player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Netherborn Phalanx
oracle_text:
When Netherborn Phalanx enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life for each creature they control.
Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Necroplasm
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Necroplasm.
At the beginning of your end step, destroy each creature with converted mana cost equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on Necroplasm.
Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Necromantic Thirst
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Mortipede
oracle_text: {2}{G}: All creatures able to block Mortipede this turn do so.
flavor_text: Mortipede pheromones choke the streets with sickly sweetness, luring the rash and unwary into its waiting jaws.

name: Moonlight Bargain
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. For each card, put that card into your graveyard unless you pay 2 life. Then put the rest into your hand.
flavor_text: At every fifth full moon, the Moon Market convenes to peddle Ravnica's most forbidden wares.

name: Mausoleum Turnkey
oracle_text: When Mausoleum Turnkey enters the battlefield, return target creature card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: When he reaches for his key ring, you should be running for the exit.

name: Last Gasp
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Allow me a moment to catch your breath."

name: Keening Banshee
oracle_text:
Flying
When Keening Banshee enters the battlefield, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Her cold wail echoes in the alleys and under-eaves, finding the unfortunate and turning their blood to ice.

name: Infectious Host
oracle_text: When Infectious Host dies, target player loses 2 life.
flavor_text: "Lost man, dead man, knocking on the door. Cankerman, soreman, knock no more." —Ravnican children's rhyme

name: Hunted Horror
oracle_text:
Trample
When Hunted Horror enters the battlefield, target opponent creates two 3/3 green Centaur creature tokens with protection from black.

name: Hex
oracle_text: Destroy six target creatures.
flavor_text: When killing five just isn't enough.

name: Helldozer
oracle_text: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, untap Helldozer.
flavor_text: Sometimes you go to hell, and sometimes hell comes to you.

name: Golgari Thug
oracle_text:
When Golgari Thug dies, put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.
Dredge 4 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly four cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Empty the Catacombs
oracle_text: Each player returns all creature cards from their graveyard to their hand.
flavor_text: When the dead are laid to rest in Ravnica, it's usually just a nap.

name: Disembowel
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost X.
flavor_text: "We thought we found the victim's clothes lumped in the street. As it turned out, it was the victim, insides sucked out—just a sack of skin and robes." —Agrus Kos

name: Dimir Machinations
oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of target player's library. Exile any number of those cards, then put the rest back in any order.
Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Dimir House Guard
oracle_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Dimir House Guard.
Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Darkblast
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Dark Confidant
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
flavor_text: Greatness, at any cost.

name: Clinging Darkness
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -4/-1.
flavor_text: There's an experience worse than blindness—it's the certainty that your vision is perfect and the horror that there's no world around you to see.

name: Carrion Howler
oracle_text: Pay 1 life: Carrion Howler gets +2/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: They chase tirelessly after the bone-carts that speed along the streets of the Plague Quarter.

name: Brainspoil
oracle_text:
Destroy target creature that isn't enchanted. It can't be regenerated.
Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Blood Funnel
oracle_text:
Noncreature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, counter that spell unless you sacrifice a creature.

name: Zephyr Spirit
oracle_text: When Zephyr Spirit blocks, return it to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: A spiteful force exists on Ravnica that binds these ghosts to the land of the living but forbids them to touch it.

name: Wizened Snitches
oracle_text:
Flying
Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.
flavor_text: "Be careful what information you ask them to find, for it will likely be the subject of tale time at the alehouse." —Sirislav, Dimir spy

name: Vedalken Entrancer
oracle_text: {U}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text: Their denial reaches far into your future.

name: Vedalken Dismisser
oracle_text: When Vedalken Dismisser enters the battlefield, put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: "I crept up on him, quiet as a guttermouse. And then suddenly I found myself facedown in a latrine pit behind Tin Street Market." —Sirislav, Dimir spy

name: Tunnel Vision
oracle_text: Choose a card name. Target player reveals cards from the top of their library until a card with that name is revealed. If it is, that player puts the rest of the revealed cards into their graveyard and puts the card with the chosen name on top of their library. Otherwise, the player shuffles their library.

name: Tidewater Minion
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{4}: Tidewater Minion loses defender until end of turn.
{T}: Untap target permanent.

name: Terraformer
oracle_text: {1}: Choose a basic land type. Each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.
flavor_text: "This feels a little more like home."

name: Telling Time
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.
flavor_text: Mastery is achieved when "telling time" becomes "telling time what to do."

name: Tattered Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
{B}: Regenerate Tattered Drake.
flavor_text: "Drakes embody the worst of Ravnica: great potential, twisted by selfishness and greed." —Razia

name: Surveilling Sprite
oracle_text:
Flying
When Surveilling Sprite dies, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: Their natural curiosity, combined with a knack for trespassing, makes sprites excellent spies.

name: Stasis Cell
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
{3}{U}: Attach Stasis Cell to target creature.
flavor_text: The Simic created the cells to preserve their experiments. The Azorius put the cells to use on the guilty.

name: Spawnbroker
oracle_text: When Spawnbroker enters the battlefield, you may exchange control of target creature you control and target creature with power less than or equal to that creature's power an opponent controls.
flavor_text: "The trick isn't setting up the bad trade. It's making each side think it got the better deal."

name: Snapping Drake
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: The irritable drakes are solitary nesters. Even brooding females barely contain the urge to attack their own young.

name: Remand
oracle_text:
Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Well, at least all of that arm-waving and arcane babbling you did was impressive."

name: Quickchange
oracle_text:
Target creature becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Most Ravnicans lead lives of desperate survival. Those who thrive are malleable enough to change with the ever-shifting politics of the guilds.

name: Peel from Reality
oracle_text: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: When House Dimir's secrets are in danger of exposure, the guild takes drastic measures to cover its tracks.

name: Muddle the Mixture
oracle_text:
Counter target instant or sorcery spell.
Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Mnemonic Nexus
oracle_text: Each player shuffles their graveyard into their library.
flavor_text: True enlightenment comes not with a new thought, but with understanding of all the old ones.

name: Mark of Eviction
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, return enchanted creature and all Auras attached to that creature to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: Tharashk the Bold suddenly wasn't himself. Or anyone else, for that matter.

name: Lore Broker
oracle_text: {T}: Each player draws a card, then discards a card.
flavor_text: Lies are sold as often as truths—and used just as effectively.

name: Induce Paranoia
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If {B} was spent to cast this spell, that spell's controller puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard, where X is the spell's converted mana cost.

name: Hunted Phantasm
oracle_text:
Hunted Phantasm can't be blocked.
When Hunted Phantasm enters the battlefield, target opponent creates five 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

name: Halcyon Glaze
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, Halcyon Glaze becomes a 4/4 Illusion creature with flying in addition to its other types until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Earth to æther, window to wonder, stillness to the sky." —Glazing incantation

name: Grozoth
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
